DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine safety tolerability RN564 woman osteopenia healthy men .
DOC.brief_title: Safety And Tolerability Study Of RN564 In Women With Osteopenia And Healthy Men .
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis osteopenia woman ( BMD Tscores 1.0 2.5 SD lumbar spine , femoral neck total hip ) Body Mass Index ( BMI ) 17.5 30.5 kg/m2 ; total body weight > 45 kg ( 99 lb ) . Have least 3 vertebral body L1L4 region one femoral neck site accessible DXA . Evidence history underlie condition , primary osteopenia , affect bone metabolism ( eg , hyperparathyroidism , hypoparathyroidism ) . Subjects preexist periodontal/dental disease undergone invasive dental procedure ( eg , tooth extraction , oral surgery ) within 60 day prior Day 1 . If QTcF exceed 455 msec , ECG repeat two time average three QTcF value use determine subject 's eligibility .
